title: "Oppoâ€™s custom MariSilicon chips are all but dead"
excerpt: "Oppo shuttering its custom chip design subsidiary won't impact phones and devices already using the MariSilicon X ISP. But this should shut the door on MariSilicon chips appearing in the company's future devices. Going forward, Oppo will likely rely on the built-in ISP of MediaTek and Qualcomm SoCs that it will use in its phones."
